message: Let's start fair. I'll take 95%, you get 5%.  We can always adjust in later rounds.
Let's try a more balanced split. You can still get most of it, but I'll take a bit more this time.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise, but let's be reasonable. I'll take 80%, you get 20%.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's try 25-75 again.
